text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP Why do you continue to encourage large closed quarter crowds when the coronavirus is spiraling out of control. What is happening is your fault for pushing governors to reopen too soon. Now the people suffer the consequences. Instead of promoting responsibility you do the opposite
